name: Name
question step one: First, let's find out what type of course you're making.
course-create-step1-option1-description: Create rich learning experiences with the help of video lectures, quizzes, coding exercises, etc.
course-create-step1-option2-description: Help students prepare for certification exams by providing practice questions.
course-create-step2-it's okay: It's ok if you can't think of a good title now. You can change it later.
course-create-step2-placeholder: e.g. Learn Photoshop CS6 from Scratch
question step three: What category best fits the knowledge you'll share?
course-create-step3-it's okay: If you're not sure about the right category, you can change it later.
question step four: How much time can you spend creating your course per week?
course-create-step4-it's okay: There's no wrong answer. We can help you achieve your goals even if you don't have much time.
curriculum-describe: Start putting together your course by creating sections, lectures and practice activities (quizzes, coding exercises and assignments). Use your course outline to structure your content and label your sections and lectures clearly. If you’re intending to offer your course for free, the total length of video content must be less than 2 hours.
sectionIncome: What will students be able to do at the end of this section
contentType-des: Select the main type of content. Files and links can be added as resources.
video input condition: All files should be at least 720p and less than 4.0 GB.
Please enter a value that is at least 3: Please enter a value that is at least 3 characters long in this field
section delete message: You are about to remove a curriculum item. Are you sure you want to continue?
email in use: The email address you entered is already in use. Please try a different one or sign in to your existing account.
reset-pass-email-sent-paragraph: You should soon receive an email allowing you to reset your password. Please make sure to check your spam and trash if you can't find the email.
basics-describe: Your course landing page is crucial to your success on CAcademy. If it’s done right, it can also help you gain visibility in search engines like Google. As you complete this section, think about creating a compelling Course Landing Page that demonstrates why someone would want to enroll in your course.
edit-course-basics: Your title should be a mix of attention-grabbing, informative, and optimized for search
edit-course-basics-course-subtitle: Use 1 or 2 related keywords, and mention 3-4 of the most important areas that you've covered during your course.
What is primarily taught in your course: What is primarily taught in your course
image conditions: Upload your course image here. It must meet our course image quality standards to be accepted. Important guidelines: 750x422 pixels; .jpg, .jpeg,. gif, or .png. no text on the image.
